Class MyZombie

      Zombie

public class MyZombie
extends UltraZombie

Plan out Karl's actions. Zombies aren't that smart, in order to reach their goal, they must follow a plan to the letter. If the zombie runs into an obstacle that isn't accounted for in the plan, the zombie's plan will fail. If the zombie's plan runs out of steps, the zombie will give up and die.

Method Detail

plan

public void plan()
Plan out Karl's actions. Use the move() and turnRight() methods to help your MyZombie reach the goal. This method is called whenever the 'Act' or 'Run' button gets pressed in the Greenfoot environment.
